item.title: Quick and Easy Casseroles for Busy Moms
item.description: Discover 10 easy dump-and-bake casseroles that busy moms can prepare quickly. Enjoy satisfying meals that the whole family will love, ready in no time!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 can cream of mushroom soup
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 2 cups frozen mixed vegetables
  • 1 package tater tots
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a large bowl, combine ground beef, cream of mushroom soup, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
  3. Add frozen mixed vegetables and half of the cheddar cheese, mixing until well combined.
  4. Spread the mixture into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
  5. Top with tater tots and remaining cheddar cheese.
  6. Bake for 45 minutes or until the tater tots are golden brown and the casserole is bubbly.
